Articles.Content:
The [streaming schedule](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/334) has been posted.

Happy landings!

p.s. That logo looks great!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T14:32:52Z" title="04/25/2015 02:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Starhawk**
So Scott Manley for sunday... does anyone know if/when he'll be streaming today?
Hypey hype. Also you might wanna get the who two part and patato chip siggy away. Its already confirmed for a 2 part and proccedural.
I'm super hyped to start a fresh career mode, but is anyone else also looking forward to seeing which of their vehicles still fly and can survive re-entry in 1.0? Shovel that space coal!
I imagine the media YouTube videos will be out when the stream starts?

dang it, i have two days off, no hard line internet, so i have a data limitation on my internet and can't watch the streams. Can someone post a summary of the 1.0 features during the last two days before release?

> 
> dang it, i have two days off, no hard line internet, so i have a data limitation on my internet and can't watch the streams. Can someone post a summary of the 1.0 features during the last two days before release?

Highlights, Female kerbals, FAAIRINGS, more parts, Functioning areo, No more placeholder IVA,Clambering,Reentry heat,aand harvs secret feature and new easter eggs.

> 
> I'm super hyped to start a fresh career mode, but is anyone else also looking forward to seeing which of their vehicles still fly and can survive re-entry in 1.0? Shovel that space coal!

I am planning on re-building my vehicles "if" they don't move over, But I really want to see my ships explode anyway so I am looking forward to it!![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I jut spilled my latest Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster, due to the latest shift in velocities. I thought it was supposed to be smooth?

Good thing my towel is plaidÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.

Hype is good today! We're averaging a post anywhere between 1 and 30 minutes.

BTdubs, what is the record for longest hype train again?

> 
> Hypey hype. Also you might wanna get the who two part and patato chip siggy away. Its already confirmed for a 2 part and proccedural.

I won't believe it until I see it in a stream today! Hype.
Two hours until stream.

> 
> Two hours until stream.

Man I've been waiting for this stream since yesterday, when they cancelled squadcast.

i am mega hyped for the stream but...

What if 1.0 is an April fools joke =0

It is still April right? And it also seems too good to be true ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> And yours isn't?!...![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Where will the stream be posted so I can watch (yes this will be my first time watching a ksp live stream)
On the forum front page there is a link to KSP TV
Let me add myself to the **HYPE TRAIN** ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
I am online and epicly hyped!

> 
> Isn't that kind of like saying "my towel is somewhere between seven and seven hundred inches long"?

I prefer phrases like "we have between five and six thousand active users" :>

thank you
Does anybody know if the holes in bills and bobs cheeks in the opening screen is an artifact of ATM? I keep asking in twitch, but nobody seems to know, or is missing my question.
